item.title: About
item.description: It is not our abilities that show what we truly are, It is our choices. – Professor Albus Dumbledore Hi ‚úãüèº, I am Molla Mostafizur Rahman(Rimon). People usually call me Rimon. I work as a Senior Software Engineer at Tiger IT Bangladesh Limited in Dhaka, Bangladesh. I joined Tiger IT in December 2016 as a Software Engineer after completing my Bsc in Computer Science and Engineering from United International University.
